title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display some help. However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read. The F1 key for the change editor menu should keep the help window open for the user to read.
SR: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display some help. The help window should remain open until the user closes it, allowing them to read the contents properly.
